bedroom.Name: Tallboy & Lowboy Set
bedroom.Body:
Tallboy - Lowboy - Bedroom Furniture

NOTE: ALL FIRST TIME CUSTOMERS GET A 3% DISCOUNT OFF THE VALUE OF THE GOODS THEY ORDER - Simply enter the code FIRST when checking out.

Payment Options: Internet Banking / Laybuy / AFTERPAY / Mastercard / Visa / Cash / EFTPOS.
We can set you up a personalised laybuy scheme from $1 deposit.

WINZ Quotes can be supplied.

DELIVERY: See delivery options when checking out. More details on our delivery page.

We encourage you to visit us see our furniture for yourself, there is no way of knowing what quality is like through a computer screen! We are proud of the quality of our furniture.

Features a veneer finish.

Particle Board/Honeycomb Board & MDF Construction
Drawers on metal extension runners.

Assembled Size:

Tallboy: 1080mm H x 390mm D x 800mm W

Lowboy: 850mm H x 390mm D x 1200mm W 

It is KITSET so assembly is REQUIRED.For $100 we can have this fully assemble for you. Please note fully assemble product must be picked up. Assembly fee payable on pick up.

Carton Dimensions: It is supplied in 3 cartons.

Box 1: 126 x 42 x 15cm

Box 2: 120 x 41 x 8cm

Box 3: 154 x 42 x 13cm

GST receipts are supplied. 

We offer a 12-month conditional warranty.
